title: Gates Of The Arctic National Park & Preserve: Education
body: A Remote and Wild Classroom Make an adventure out of learning!  Though Gates of the Arctic National Park & Preserve is remote, students can learn about the natural and cultural history of this astonishingly wild resource through field trips to the Fairbanks Alaska Public Lands Information Center located inside the Morris Thompson Cultural and Visitors Center.  Explore our Field Trip options and Traveling Trunks below.                 Field Trips Explore the natural and cultural history of Interior Alaska through a field trip with the Alaska Public Lands Information Center in Fairbanks. Read More        Traveling Trunks Bring your natural and cultural history lessons to life! Check out one of our education kits. Read More
